title: I Drew Tristana
body:
[](http://orig11.deviantart.net/d262/f/2015/040/a/5/tristana_sticker_by_noxidassylem-d8hes1f.png)

http://imgur.com/rEBmDyY

Or at least I drew the head. I was too lazy to finish, but let's just say that hypothetically this post got about 25 up votes then maybe there could be a full body drawing possibly.

P.S. I suck at drawing! DON'T JUDGE MEH!!!!!11111!!!!!!!!!!!11111!!11111!!11!!!11!!!111!!111one

P.P.S To the Rioter to that removed this original post, YES this is where it should be, because I am not taking this seriously! Hell, I even used a thumbnail bait, do you really think I am taking this seriously? Besides the part of the 25 up votes, that part is serious.

~~Edit: We are 14 upvotes away from seeing me mess up hilariously on the body, don't you want to see that?~~

~~Edit: WE ARE LOWERING THE UPVOTES NEEDED TO 20! So that means 4 more up votes and we get a full body Tristana.~~

Edit: WORKING ON IT!
